subject: docs(tutorial): update all documentation to reflect current architecture
body:
Update TutorialModal steps to accurately describe the current feature set:
- Graph and Timeline views (was: Graph, Kanban, List, Table)
- Label-based filtering with boolean operators (was: name, tag, or type)
- JSON and Markdown import with merge review (was: JSON, CSV, or Markdown)
- Added analysis algorithms step
- Added conventions page mention
- Mention demo data in welcome step

Rewrite discovery document (graph-wiki-discovery.md) to match current
label-based architecture after Product Realignment. Removed all references
to schema-centric model (SchemaBlueprint, NodeType, ArcType, designer mode,
Kanban/List/Table views, CSV import, ImportRuleSets). Document now accurately
describes: label-based classification, recursive-descent query engine,
Graph+Timeline views, merge review import system, analysis algorithms,
conventions page, and PWA capabilities.

Mark product-realignment-plan.md as COMPLETED with historical reference note.

Tags: docs, tutorial, discovery, phase-complete
Complexity: 2
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: paid
Epic: documentation
Semver: patch

title: update all documentation to reflect current architecture
